import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import InputMask from 'react-input-mask'; import styles from './styles.module.scss' import clsx from 'clsx' export default function AdminEditsComponent({title = 'Title', link, save, data}) { console.log("AdminEditsComponent -> data", data) const [visiblePopup, setVisiblePopup] = React.useState(true); const [activeItem, setActiveItem] = React.useState(0); const fileInput = React.createRef() const imgFile = React.createRef() const [headerValue, setHeaderValue] = React.useState(data.data.heading_ru) const [date, setDate] = React.useState(data.data.date) const [descrip, setDescrip] = React.useState(data.data.description_ru) const [content, setContent] = React.useState(data.data.content_ru) const [status, setStatus] = React.useState(data.data.status.id) const allLang = ['RU', 'KZ'] const onSelectItem = id => { setActiveItem(id) setVisiblePopup(!visiblePopup) } const addImgFile = () => { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = function (e) { imgFile.current.src = e.target.result; }; reader.readAsDataURL(fileInput.current.files[0]); } const statusChange = e =>{ console.log("AdminEditsComponent -> e", e) } return(
